text: Edward Kern "Ted" Demme (October 26, 1963 – January 14, 2002) was an American movie director and producer. His career began in 1988. His movies included The Ref (1994), Beautiful Girls (1996), Life and Blow. He died during a celebrity basketball game in Santa Monica, California due to a heart attack. The heart attack may have been caused by cocaine. He was 38 years old when he died. He was married to Amanda Demme from 1994 until his death. The couple had two sons. He was the nephew of Jonathan Demme. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Movie Starring 1993 Who's the Man? title: Ted Demme
